attributes.action: demand that Herefordshire Council withdraw their proposals for education provision in the county.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "demand that Herefordshire Council withdraw their proposals for education provision in the county."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16825


Prime Minister's Office
